section_title: CONSIDERATION OF PROPOSALS BY PARTIES FOR AMENDMENTS TO THE CONVENTION UNDER ARTICLE 15: Proposal from the Russian Federation
sentences: This item (FCCC/CP/2011/5) was first considered on Wednesday, 3 December.
COP 20 President Pulgar-Vidal proposed, and parties agreed to, informal consultations co-facilitated by Antonio García (Peru) and Augusto Cabrera Rebaza (Peru).
On Friday, 12 December, parties agreed to continue consideration of this issue at COP 21.
Proposal from Papua New Guinea and Mexico: This item (FCCC/CP/2011/4/Rev.1) was first considered on Wednesday, 3 December.
COP 20 President Pulgar-Vidal proposed, and parties agreed to, informal consultations co-facilitated by Antonio García and Augusto Cabrera Rebaza.
On Friday, 12 December, parties agreed to continue consideration of this issue at COP 21.
